snippet.title: The Walking Dead: Saints and Sinners Ch2 Retribution - PlayStation State of Play Trailer
snippet.description:
Skydance Interactive, a division of Skydance Media, and Skybound Entertainment treated PlayStation fans to a brand new trailer for The Walking Dead: Saints & Sinners - Chapter 2: Retribution, and confirmed the game’s upcoming release on PSVR and PSVR 2. The development team at Skydance Interactive is thrilled to join PlayStation at the forefront of the next generation of virtual reality.

The matriarch of the Tower has some choice words for you in this latest trailer for TWDSS Ch2.  You would do well to listen, Tourist.  With Mama’s sights on removing you from NOLA once and for all, can you survive her deadly wrath?

TWDSS Chapter 2: Retribution will launch later this year on many VR platforms.

For news and details sign up at VRWalkingDead.com or follow us on social media for the latest info: 
 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/walkingdeadvr 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/gaming/WalkingDeadVR  
Instagram:https://www.instagram.com/twdss/ 
Discord:   https://discord.gg/aC6KMDXgPJ
